Simple and Secure Installation This ladder cover is easy to install, with adjustable straps and a snug fit that ensures it stays securely in place. It’s compatible with most standard bunk bed ladders, providing a universal solution for your home. Neutral and Versatile Design With its sleek and neutral design, this ladder cover blends seamlessly into any room decor without drawing unnecessary attention. It complements the look of your furniture while adding an essential safety feature. Why Choose Our Bunk Bed Ladder Cover? Prevents young children from climbing ladders Easy to install and remove Made from durable, child-safe materials Fits most standard bunk bed ladders Sleek, modern design for any room Prioritize Safety with Confidence Protect your little ones and reduce accidents with this effective bunk bed ladder cover. name: Vinyl Works AF Adjustable 24 Inch Ladder for Above Ground Swimming Pools with Secure Gate Closure and 2 Deck Mount Flanges, White
short_description: Reliable Entry & Exit: Dual-sided steps with handrails offer easy, safe entry and exit into an above-ground pool; Embossed with no diving and no jumping safety reminders
Durable Construction: Manufactured using maintenance-free materials to maintain strength and color; Stainless hardware is used for years of worry-free use
Easy Assembly: System is easy to assemble with components that snap together; Full gate system opens outward and is self-closing, self-latching, and lockable (lock not included)

Safety Features: Step system designed to prevent entrapment while allowing great water circulation; Non-slip surface and 7.5-inch deep stairs provide a reliable step; Smoothly rounded base ensures no pool liner damage

Spec Details: Top platform adjusts from 47.5 to 56.25 inches to accommodate pool wall height; Occupies only 22 inches within the pool for minimum obstruction, great for smaller pools; Clearance between handrails is 20.25 inches; Pool ladder weight capacity is 300 pounds
product_description: Set up an easy and safe way to enter or exit your pool using the Adjustable Gated Entry Pool Ladder from Vinyl Works. Ideal for above-ground swimming pools, this ladder will be a great addition and can support users up to 300 pounds to safely guide them in and out of your pool. It is a stable entry system that is ideal for everyday use and easier to climb as compared to a conventional a-frame pool ladder. Featuring a plastic construction with stainless steel hardware, this ultra-stable ladder provides ultimate safety for all swimmers. Built with 2 deck mount flanges for greater stability, full step entry, and double handrails, this ladder is made for pools up to 4.5-foot side walls and a flat bottom. The latching gate securely closes and locks when the pool is not in use to prevent unwanted activity and injuries. The model AF is a double step entry system for easy climbing in and out of your pool. It has a self-closing, self-latching and lockable gate for both safety and to meet code requirements. It is adjustable from 48 inches to 56 inches with a 12-inch top rail clearance. With only a 22-inch foot print, this ladder allows for maximum use of your pool. Provide a convenient way to enter your pool and relax in no time with the Vinyl Works AF Model Above-Ground Pool Ladder with double entry system. Each unit includes explicit installation instructions and all necessary hardware for proper assembly.
